price: 38. Waxay odhan: Waa goorma gooddigani (cadaabka) haddaad run sheegaysaan?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
